mapper.insert: insert into tb_business_knowledge (knowledge_id, title, domain, knowledge_explain, create_time, user_id, praise_num, is_top, last_update_time, business_id) values (#{knowledgeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{knowledgeExplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isTop,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.select: select knowledge_id, title, domain, knowledge_explain, create_time, user_id, praise_num, is_top, last_update_time, business_id from tb_business_knowledge where knowledge_id = #{knowledgeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
